data.text: @smdoung Shannon, our colleagues asked JFK department in charge to contact you as soon as possible.

data.text: @fotios_vellios Hola, we're deeply sorry and have just replied your DM. Best regards
@TheRichSchaefer Hola, we're sorry for the inconvenience. Please contact our colleagues at the airport for further information. Best regards
@LOL_010Roffa You're welcome :)

urls.title: Iberia
urls.description: Iberia, Madrid, Spain. 1,889,176 likes · 25,343 talking about this · 969 were here. A tu servicio 24 horas. ¿En qué podemos ayudarte? At your service 24 hours a day. How can we help? *Assistance in...

data.text: @CcDavidson1 Please ask the passenger to contact us through https://t.co/fzrdtq8Spx , since she doesn't have a TW account
@milton15 Hola, we're sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your PIR reference number and full name https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@LOL_010Roffa We've replied the DM. The case was sent to our IT team and we'll keep you posted. Kind regards
@BGilson89 Hola, sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name, email address and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@LSveass We're deeply sorry to read this and would like to take this opportunity to offer our sincerest apologies for any inconvenience that might have happened at the airport. We've replied your DMs

urls.title: Complaints about service - Iberia
urls.description: Our Customer Service Centre includes an Iberia Complaints Service for handling customers' complaints and suggestions

data.text: @JulClaude The claim can be filed through the following form https://t.co/pVVvyg1YzT. You need to select 'assistance' as claim type and then use the text field to explain what happened. If an 'error message' pops up, you just need to keep clicking on 'continue'. Regards
@LSveass Hola Luc, we're sorry to read this. In case you need further assistance, please send us a DM with more details https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

@steph_s_miller Hola Stephanie, we're deeply sorry for the inconvenience. If you already completed the check-in, please contact our colleagues at the airport on the day of your flight in order to change the seat selection. Only the airport agents are able to manage the booking after the check-in

@JulClaude Hola Julien, we still haven't received a final report about the flight you mention. As we can see, it was rescheduled to leave at 15h45. If you need further information, please contact our colleagues at the airport. Best regards

@susanemurphy Hola Susan. We are sorry to read about this, if you are at the airport, please check with our colleagues at the airport desks your your options and alternatives at your disposal. 
Kind regards,

@LilianTodter Hello Lilian. Do you have an irregularity part (PIR) code? To which lines are you trying to contact with? Could you please provide us  the details via direct message  https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa so we'd be able to consult from here? We remain at your disposal. 
Kind Regards

@russrobert Hola Russ. If you already submitted a claim form, our colleagues have up to 7 to 21 days (business) to get back to you by email. We appreciate your patience,  If you do not have any response after these days, please come back to us. 
Kind regards.

@c6945v Hola Chris. We ask you to please be patient, your flight's crew is doing everything possible to get your flight going as soon as possible, For any inquiry on this situation, we suggest you to consult directly with them. Apologies for the inconveniences, best regards.

@Rhoadey Hola Rhoadey, we are very sorry for this incident. If you have already boarded your flight, please request more details on this situation directly with your flight's crew, they will be able to inform you. Kind regards.

@CcDavidson1 Hola Cecilia, unfortunately due to privacy reasons, we would only be able to discuss the details with the claim holder. If your daughter issued the claim directly at the airport, please indicate her to contact us directly so we can assist her. Kind regards.

urls.title: Restricciones para viajar por COVID-19
urls.description: Comprueba la normativa, requerimientos y restricciones para viajar que establecen los países. Planifica tu vuelo asegurándote que cumples con todos los requisitos para hacer tu viaje internacional.

data.text: @gabbiesalinas Hola, Gabriela. Desde aquí solo podríamos indicarte las restricciones que aparecen en nuestra web: https://t.co/J4NrDAA0xS Ante cualquier duda adicional, sugerimos verificar con las autoridades locales. Un saludo.

urls.title: Complaints about service - Iberia
urls.description: Our Customer Service Centre includes an Iberia Complaints Service for handling customers' complaints and suggestions

data.text: @jdwhite1 We offer you an apology for all this inconveniences, you can use our web form ( https://t.co/qlaQPQxXaG ) to issue a claim, so that the corresponding department can verify all the details of your case. Kind regards.

@DaniGarciaGonz Hola, Daniela. Entendemos la urgencia de tu solicitud. Como lo indicamos a través del MD que nos enviaste. El área encargada está trabajando en tu caso, en cuanto tengamos alguna novedad te informaremos. Saludos.

@Kamcrao Hola Kamlesh, if you purchased your tickets with us and your flights are operated by an airline of the Iberia Group, you will be able to verify the options at your disposal in your booking area ( https://t.co/0Kf2bPGDPV ) . Kind regards.

@nimodosoygus Hola Gus, please give us more details on this, did you mail our health department? Please send us a DM with the details of your booking and your case so we can have a look. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@jdwhite1 Hola, we are very sorry to read this. Please consult directly with the personnel at the airport counters regarding the status of your delayed bag. Our colleagues will do everything possible to deliver them as soon as possible, let us know if you received your bags. Kind regards.
@QuinnMaroney1 Hola Quinn, we have replied to your DMs. Kind regards.
@misschris61 Hola. muchas gracias por escribirnos. Nos alegra saber que cumplimos con tus expectativas. Quedamos a tu disposición. Saludos.
@yoavoren5 Hola, we are very sorry for this. We have replied to your DMs. Kind regards.

@babyyoomfi Hola, we're very sorry to read about this incident. Please let us know if you were able to claim it directly at the airport counters. If you did, please send us a DM with the details so we can have a look and assist you. Kind regards. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@KaraBur19987206 Hola Kara. We have replied to your DM's. Regards.
@msprieto1 Hola. We're glad to read that you've received assistance. If you have further queries, we remain at your disposal. Regards.
@MartaGutierrez_ Marta, envíanos por MD (https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6) el código PIR asignado en el aeropuerto y nombre completo.

urls.title: Travelling with children on board - Iberia
urls.description: See all the information regarding how to travel with children on board. There are special regulations adapted to their age so they can fly more safely

data.text: @marsvcr Hola Victor. You could add your baby once she has been born. Please read further details here: https://t.co/rHmofK2hIy. Regards.
@LaMaraahr Muchas gracias por la información enviada, estamos revisando tu MD. Seguiremos la conversación por esa vía.

@juana___f Hola Juana, lamentamos escuchar lo que nos comentas. En este caso, es necesario que te acerques al personal de Iberia en tierra para que te puedan dar actualizaciones y puedan verificar las opciones que tienes. Lamentamos los inconvenientes. Saludos
@MartaGutierrez_ Hola Marta, sentimos leer sobre esto, ¿presentaste el reclamo formal en mostradores? Saludos
@msprieto1 Hola, we're sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your PIR (property irregularity report) and full name https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

@yoavoren5 Hola, we're sorry to read this and have just replied your DM. Unfortunately, your flight was cancelled due to the weather conditions, which is a reason outside our control. We remain at your disposal
@MikennaMT Hola Mikenna, we're deeply sorry and have just replied your DM. Please check and get back to us with your PIR reference number and full name

@LaMaraahr Hola La Maraah, lamentamos escuchar lo que nos comentas. Desde este canal te vamos a ayudar. Envíanos en un MD (https://t.co/HyIAB5NZjE) la vía por la que solicitaste el cambio, código de reserva, número de billete (075******) y mail asociado a la misma. Quedamos atentos, saludos
@Singhsptanu Hola Tanu, we're sorry for the inconvenience. Could you send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...)? https://t.co/HyIAB652lE
@Carolie70 Hola Carol, we're sorry your comment. The flight IB7463 (BA461) is actually operated by British Airways. Could you please clarify if you need further assistance?

data.text: @Carolynnmmm Hola Carolyn, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@LOL_010Roffa You're welcome :)
@LOL_010Roffa Hola, we've sent a new message to the bookings department and we'll get back to you as soon as we have an update. Regards
@NAISOLA Thanks. We'll contact the relevant department and keep you posted

@NAISOLA Please send us a DM with the permanent delivery address, because the one on the PIR looks incomplete. This way we can contact the baggage centre and check if the bag's arrival has been confirmed and to which address it was sent https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

@NAISOLA Unfortunately, there isn't an update about the bag's location. Once they have been located, you'll receive a SMS or email with further details. After 21 days without luggage, you can claim compensation based on its content. We remain at your disposal

@NAISOLA No, this doesn't mean that you won't receive the bags. Once you receive the bags back, you can get back to us and we'll ask the claims department to initiate the first necessity expenses' refund process.

@NAISOLA Hola, on june 30 you opened a PIR (property irregularity report), which is used to track the missing bags. The case we opened yesterday is an online claim, which you'll use to claim the reimbursment of the first necessity expenses that you are having for being without luggage

@babyyoomfi Hola, we're deeply sorry for the inconvenience. Did you open a PIR (property irregularity report) with the airline that operated the last flight in your itinerary? Please send us a DM with the PIR number and your full name https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@BuckeyeTap Unfortunately, the only way to appeal is through the same online form. Sorry
@BuckeyeTap Hola, we're sorry for the inconvenience and have just replied your DM. Kind regards
@xulucy Hola, please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@leslyann37 inform your original claim code and provide additional infos explaining exactly what you need. Regards

urls.title: Complaints about service - Iberia
urls.description: Our Customer Service Centre includes an Iberia Complaints Service for handling customers' complaints and suggestions

data.text: @leslyann37 We're sorry to read this. If you wish to appeal and have the case reviewed by our colleagues, you need to use the same online form https://t.co/pVVvyg1YzT. Select  ‘assistance’ as complaint reason, then use the text box to /1

@ringmyDORbell_ Hola, we are sorry to read this, we have escalated your case to the relevant department to verify your payment process , as soon as we have an update, we'll contact you back. Kind regards
@hofer_angela Hola Angela, we are sorry to read this, please contact our desk agents in order they be able to help you with the baggage claim PIR request. Regards

@daffjoseph Hola Dafne, sentimos los posibles inconvenientes ocasionados, si tu consulta es en español debes dirigirte a @iberia. Esperamos por esa vía detalles por DM sobre el cobro que reclamas para poder revisar. Saludos
@lautgesetz Hola, we have replied to your DMs, apologies for the inconveniences. Kind regards.

@lautgesetz Hola David, our colleagues will do everything possible to contact you today, we ask you to please be patient, they haven't reached your case yet but it does have priority. You will be contacted from a long and unknown number, please stay tuned. Kind regards.
@smdoung Hola Shannon, we understand that the JFK airport has been contacted regarding this incident, we will consult again, once we have more details we will inform you. Kind regards.

data.text: @CcDavidson1 Hola Cecilia, we are really sorry to read this. We understand this claim is for a delayed bag incident, if you are not the claim holder, please indicate this person to contact us directly so we can assist her. Kind regards.
@binbag500 Hola, we are checking your DM. Regards
@ManiacMcCormill JM, you can fill a claim here https://t.co/ci7QjJOm3t.

@ManiacMcCormill Hola JM, we haven´t got any updates of the luggage, however we still tracking it and you can claim the total cost of it after 21 days. As soon as our colleagues from the responsible department receive any update, they will contact you by SMS or email
@TonyaB75 Tonya, we are sorry for the inconvenience. In this case we suggest you to contact our colleagues from the responsible department https://t.co/ci7QjJOm3t so they can give you any update.
@TeacherBriBri We're sorry for the inconvenience, Brianna, and have replied your DMs. Best regards
@NAISOLA Hola, we've just replied your DM. Best regards

@sabrimb182 Hola Sabrina, sorry for the inconvenience. Did you open a PIR (property irregularity report) at the airport with the airline that operated the last flight in your itinerary? Please send us a DM with the PIR number and your full name https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

@katefroehlich46 There's no need to worry, Kate. The baggage centre has all addresses and dates. Notice that there's a note on your PIR saying ''TO BE ADVISED. SEE FF LINES'', this means that they need to check the addresses you sent before delivering the bag. Regards
@jordi4428 Hola, lamentamos leer lo que nos indicas. Los compañeros en mostradores harán todo lo posible por atenderte lo antes posible, te pedimos tener paciencia. Saludos.
@AlisonFranck Sorry, Alison. We'll contact the bookings department and get back to you via DM as soon as we have an update
@Chuckieinalba You're welcome :)

@katefroehlich46 Please send us a DM with the claim reference number generated online when you submited the reimbursment claim, as we couldn't locate it when using your PIR number https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@Chuckieinalba You can also check the flight status by accessing the booking management page https://t.co/0Kf2bPGDPV
@Chuckieinalba Hola. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@rayalseematiger Hola, we're sorry to read this and have just replied your DMs
@LOL_010Roffa You're welcome. We've sent you a new DM

@katefroehlich46 You're welcome Kate, in this case our colleagues still working on the location of your baggage, as soon as they have an update, they will contact you by sms or email.  We appreciate your patience. Kind regards
@redlionny Hola, we've just replied your DM. Please check and provide the required informations
@LOL_010Roffa We'll ask the relevant department to re-send the ticket to both email address. Best regards
@katefroehlich46 Sorry, Kate. We've located a call from you on july 15, when you provided all temporary addresses. So there's no need to worry about this. Best regards
@AlisonFranck Sorry, Alison. We've sent you a new DM
@Anthrogirl29 We're deeply sorry for the inconvenience and would like to offer our apologies. We kindly ask you to please wait in line so our colleagues are able to assist you. Kind regards

@katefroehlich46 Hola Kate, unfortunately, your bags still haven't been located. Once our baggage centre has any news, you'll be contacted by SMS or email. In order to change the temporary delivery address, which already expired, please use the World Tracer website: https://t.co/P60eOiMvWp
@LOL_010Roffa You're welcome, we have also replied your DM. Regards
@Anthrogirl29 Hola Manda, we ar esorry to read this, in this case it is necessary to contact our desk agents to help you. We really appreciate your patience. Kind regards

@sandylynnmb Hola Sandy, we are sorry to read this, could you please tell us by DM all details of your inquiry including your booking code, ticket number and registered email to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@amormorado_ Hola, seguimos tu consulta a través de @iberia. Gracias
@leslyann37 Hola Lesly, we are sorry to read this, we have replied your DM with all details of your complaint. Regards
@travelsandCHT Hola Tany, thank you for contacting us, could you please tell us by DM all details of your inquiry? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@LucasAsher5 we are sorry to read this Lucas, we have replied your DM. Regards
@LOL_010Roffa Thank you for the information, we have replied your DM. Regards
@Donnamarrie Hola Donna, we are sorry to read this, if you bought your tickets through an agency, please contact them directly to verify the available options. Kind regards
@r2_mmn Thank you for the information, we have replied your DM. Regards
@LucasAsher5 Hola Lucas, we are sorry to read this, we have replied your DM. Regards

@lautgesetz Hola David, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM all details of the situation including your booking code, ticket number and registered email to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@NAISOLA Thanks. We have sent you a new DM. Regards.
@NAISOLA Thanks. We have sent you a new direct message. Kind regards.
